name: NO YOLKS® Saucy Shrimp Noodles with Feta
author: NO YOLKS(R) Noodles
summary: This simple yet elegant dish can be served with a tossed leafy green salad to complete the meal.
ingredients: ½ (12 ounce) package NO YOLKS® Dumpling Noodles
2 ⅓ cups tomato and herb pasta sauce
1 teaspoon lemon juice, or to taste
½ pound peeled and deveined frozen raw shrimp, thawed
directions: Prepare the noodles according to package directions
Meanwhile, bring the sauce, sun-dried tomatoes, wine (if using), lemon juice, lemon zest (if using) and oregano to a simmer in a large skillet set over medium heat
Stir in the shrimp and cook for 3 to 4 minutes or until no pink remains
Serve the shrimp mixture over the hot cooked noodles
Garnish each serving with feta cheese and parsley
